amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following new title: \ TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS \ SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to make an application under section 501 of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 (50 U.S.C. 1861) for an order requiring the production of library circulation records, library patron lists, library Internet records, book sales records, or book customer lists.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered two printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section to the bill prohibiting funds from being made available to make an application under section 501 of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 for an order requiring the production of library circulation records, library patron lists, library Internet records, book sales records, or book customer lists.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 210, 1 Present (Roll no. 339).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Sanders.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 210, 1 Present (Roll no. 339).
